name: Pokémon Sphynx
summary:
Pokémon Sphynx is a Spanish-language fangame created by Angeleiro, also author of some Pokémon fangames like Vinyl: Mystery Solver or Sunny! Sunny! Fangame Parade.
You will incarnate Riley or Roy, the quiet protagonist(s), alongside the cheerful artist Hilda, the stupidest being alive Luka and the shy policeman Blu. This unusual group will enbark on a journey through Arkan to close the access to the dark world of Mirroria, meeting some wacky characters along their way.
